DOC.brief_summary: Multicentre Phase II trial, comparing two different administration routes of SLITonePLUS Birch in regard to pharmacodynamic efficacy and tolerability.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Tolerability of Two Different Administration Routes With SLITonePLUS Birch
DOC.criteria: A history of Birch pollen allergy Positive skin prick test to birch Positive specific IgE to birch Exclusion criteria: Uncontrolled or severe asthma (FEV1<70% of predicted value in spite of adequate pharmacologic treatment) Previous treatment by immunotherapy with birch or a crossreactingtree pollen allergen within the previous 5 years Concomitant SLIT with any allergen
